item.title: God Forgives... I Don't!
item.description: God Forgives... I Don't! is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed and written by Giuseppe Colizzi. The film is the first in a trilogy followed by Ace High and ended with Boot Hill.

item.title: Fury of Johnny Kid
item.description: Fury of Johnny Kid is a 1967 Italian-Spanish film directed by Gianni Puccini. The Italian and Spanish versions of the film have different ending. The film is a spaghetti western version of William Shakespeare's tragedy Romeo and Juliet.

item.title: Fall of the Mohicans
item.description: Fall of the Mohicans is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mateo Cano. The film is based on James Fenimore Cooper's novel The Last of the Mohicans.

item.title: Ocaso de un pistolero
item.description: Hands of a Gunfighter is a 1965 Spanish-Italian western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.
